pages.text: This section just covers the history of this book, in some semblance of order.$(br2)Please don't forget to try turning pages to see if there's more, as some facing pages (the right hand on your screen) are deliberately blank.

pages.title: V0.0.1
pages.text: Subtitled:$(br)Placeholder Edition$(br2)Date:$(br)Unknown$(br2)Released:$(br)Part of the GDN-V5-BETA pack in for the server.

In order to load a book locally, it must exist on the server. This was literally an empty book skeleton so I could work on it locally in the meantime. Nothing to see but a title, short leader text, and my own failure, I'm afraid.

The very first few pages! And opening some categories!$(li)History$(li2)Created Category$(li2)V0.0.1 History$(li2)V0.0.2 History$(li)Vanilla$(li2)Created Category$(li2)Basics$(li3)Stub Entry(li2)Mobs$(li3)Stub Entry
